message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that's worth a lot to me. I'm confident it will be valuable to you as well. My initial offer is $20000. Let me know what you think.
I'm interested in the product, but $20000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $12000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, I appreciate your interest. While $12000 is lower than my initial price, I'm willing to come down to $17000 to see if we can reach an agreement. This price still reflects the value of the product, and I believe it's fair for both of us.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $17000 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to pay $14000 for the product. Can you consider my offer?

Bob, we're getting closer. I understand your budget constraints, but $14000 just doesn't cover the value I've placed on this product. I'm willing to go down to $15500. This is my final offer before I explore other options.
I understand that you're willing to go down to $15500, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $13500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
